duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, manage, and coordinate internal sales and service initiatives and projects.
Hire, train, and develop sales and service personnel, along with performance evaluations.
Champion the development of leadership competencies that drive individual and team goals.
Ensure maintenance of customer relations at a high level and handle complex and escalated customer service issues.
Utilize key metrics to evaluate and recommend best practices for operations.
Process orders and related transactions via Safe Fleet ERP system (Syteline) in a timely manner without sacrificing accuracy.
Provide customers with sales information regarding various features and benefits of the products offered.
Follow up on customer inquiries that cannot be resolved immediately and respond to customer requirements, providing updates related to due dates or product availability.
Conduct an annual pricing review in conjunction with finance and leadership teams.
Act as a liaison between customer service and operations, participating in Sales and Operational Planning meetings to provide accurate information to Operations, Finance, and Business Unit Leaders.
Identify and implement strategies to improve quality of service, productivity, and profitability, proposing solutions to help customers run their business more effectively.
Carry out supervisory responsibilities in accordance with the organization's policies, procedures, and applicable laws.
